alert.note: Alert for Northwest Beaverhead County (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 17 at 3:22AM MST until January 18 at 11:00AM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 2 and 14 inches. Winds gusting as high as 55 mph. * WHERE...Northwest Beaverhead County. * WHEN...Until 11 AM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible and tire chains may be required for some vehicles. Those in the backcountry should ensure they have appropriate knowledge and gear and may want to consider alternate plans. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Strong winds could cause extensive damage to trees and power lines.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or visiting the MDT Road Report website.
